turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Looking to order a pizza from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me get that order going for you. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Four large pizzas, two of them veggie lovers. And the other two with sausage. All four have to have thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. your order of 4 large pizzas, 2 veggie lovers, and 2 with sausage. all four with thin crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. How long till it's ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: once i place the order, it'll take about 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll b ready for pick up in 35 mins.
